content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: IDVAR
      operator: empty
    - name: IDVARVAL
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000218
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when IDVAR is empty and IDVARVAL is not empty
Outcome:
  Message: IDVAR is empty but IDVARVAL is not empty
  Output Variables:
    - IDVAR
    - IDVARVAL
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0465
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Comments[Value of identifying variable of the parent
                  record(s).]|Supplemental Qualifiers[Value of identifying variable
                  of the parent record(s).]
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: IDVARVAL
                Section: Comments|Supplemental Qualifiers
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - CO
      - SUPP--

json.Description: Raise an error when IDVAR is empty and IDVARVAL is not empty

Outcome.Message: IDVAR is empty but IDVARVAL is not empty

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Comments[Value of identifying variable of the parent record(s).]|Supplemental Qualifiers[Value of identifying variable of the parent record(s).]
